data.message: Hi,Facebook I've problem with my sisters account. Her account has blocked by facebook so I take back it.

replies.message:
Hi Cadet. If your friend's account is disabled, they'll need to submit an appeal using the email address that was connected to their Facebook account.

Please keep in mind that we can't release information about an account to anyone but the account holder, and we won't take action on any appeals sent in on behalf of friends. Learn more here: https://www.facebook.com/help/147434898662568. 
-Meagan
Hi,facebook. I donot know how to do appeal? Please give me account of my sister. And one thing come inbox i will give you my sister's account.
